name: Zombie Last Stand HD Augmented dead frontier war z
name_original: Zombie Last Stand HD Augmented dead frontier war z
description:
Zombie Last Stand HD is completely new game experience with Augmented Reality technology. All events occur at your desk. Control team of soldiers and fire to slay Waves of Zombies!

Zombie Last Stand HD is
- Augmented Reality Game - completely new game experience!
- Team of 3 controllable soldiers!
- 3 -upgradable- weapons!
- Different Zombie types including zombie dogs and mutants!
- 50 challenging Waves!
- AR tracker can be any business card, banknote, even keyboard or other small contrast object, preferably matte.

The goal is to survive... but you wont. How far will you go?

COMPLETE WAVES, KILL ZOMBIES and beat other players on the Game Center Leaderboard!

COLLECT COINS for ZOMBIE KILL
Use coins to upgrade your weapons and increase your zombie killing efficiency.

Stay connected with us!
